response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $14,000 for the product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also the opportunity for you to maximize its potential impact. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 14000}
